description:
The year is 4022. Earth has been uninhabitable for centuries. It's your job to clean up the mess humanity left behind. Grow earth's deposit of inhabitable land and who knows what you'll find.

Whew, my very first entry into a game jam ever, stayed up until 3am to finish it, I know it's buggy and unfinished ok.

Assets by Kenney, music by Kirk Osamayo, Made for Kenney Jam 2022.
